name: Crab Run
description:
An endless runner where you control a crab trying to run away from fishers. The player needs to avoid trash, break wooden boards and break free from plastic bags to not get caught by the fishers.

Design:

Annika Riikonen, Tapio Vähä-Vahe

Coding:

Tapio Vähä-Vahe

Graphics:

Annika Riikonen

Marketing and sounds:

Osku Huhtala
